prompt: make me a website where i can track my calories and workout plans
refinedPrompt: Create a comprehensive fitness tracking website that allows users to log their daily calorie intake, monitor their macronutrient ratios, and plan their workouts. The website should include features such as a food database for easy calorie tracking, a meal planner, and a workout scheduler. Users should be able to set fitness goals, track their progress, and receive personalized recommendations based on their goals and progress. The website should have a clean, intuitive interface and be optimized for both desktop and mobile devices.
